Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • settings.Question

  • @Entity(name="Pytania")
public class Question
extends Object
    Object for storying information about single Question Created by Jakub Since 2016-04-30.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void countingGainedPoints()
      Method for counting points one got for a question For single question answer if its param isPorper is established to true and answer is matched as choosen For multiply question answer ads each answer points if its param isPorper is established to true and answer is matched as choosen
      void countingMaxPoints()
      Method for counting max points one can get for a question For multiply question answer ads each answer points if its param isPorper is established to true For single question answer choose the answer with max points between others answers in question

      • Question

        public Question(String questionName,
                Category category,
                boolean isMultiply,
                int numberOfAnswers,
                List<Answer> answersList)
        Basic Constructor, Question must have:
        Parameters:
        questionName - text for question
        category - - category of topis of quiz/questions/answers from Category
        isMultiply - - true or false provides information wheather there is only single answer or mulitiply answers are posiible
        numberOfAnswers - - numbers of answers refered to this question
        answersList - - List with objetcs Answer Answer
